title: "403 forbidden"
body: When I click on the shop button, it pops something up. I clicked "Yes" and it popped up this white screen saying "403 forbidden" How do I fix this? I've tried restarting my league and it still doesn't work.

replies.body:
We're still looking into the issue that is causing a number of players to see this error when they try to open the store. We're aware that some players are still able to open the store, and others have been able to get it to load after refreshing the store a few times.

Be sure to check our post [**here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lKb27XVQ-problems-getting-the-store-to-load) for updates as we get them!
I will wait to see if this if fixed or not. If not, I may just scan my computer for a virus.
